SELECT * FROM STOCK_INFO WHERE
UPPER(STOCK_NAME) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{keyword}) || '%' OR UPPER(STOCK_CODE) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{keyword}) || '%' ORDER BY
CASE WHEN UPPER(STOCK_NAME) = UPPER(#{keyword}) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END,
CASE WHEN UPPER(STOCK_NAME) LIKE UPPER(#{keyword}) || '%' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END,
TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(MARKET_CAP, '[^0-9]', '')) DESC
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM STOCK_NEWS WHERE TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY NEWS_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
SELECT STOCK_CODE, STOCK_NAME, MARKET_TYPE, INDUSTRY, PRICE, PRICE_CHANGE, CHANGE_RATE, MARKET_CAP, UPDATED_AT FROM STOCK_INFO WHERE STOCK_CODE = #{stockCode}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_q.*, ROWNUM AS rn FROM ( SELECT STOCK_CODE, STOCK_NAME, MARKET_TYPE, INDUSTRY, PRICE, PRICE_CHANGE, CHANGE_RATE, MARKET_CAP, UPDATED_AT FROM STOCK_INFO ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(MARKET_CAP, ',', '')) DESC ) inner_q WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end} ) WHERE rn >= #{start}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT STOCK_CODE, STOCK_NAME, CHANGE_RATE FROM STOCK_INFO ORDER BY CHANGE_RATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT STOCK_CODE, STOCK_NAME, CHANGE_RATE FROM STOCK_INFO ORDER BY CHANGE_RATE ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
